name: Gushpenia 2
description:
Shoot the enemies and survive multiple waves of enemies.

Discover and unlock a secret power which will give Gushpel powers beyond his imagination.

Controls:

  • Left Joystick: Move
  • Right Joystick: Aim
  • Right very smartly unnamed Button: Dash

This is a prototype meant for testing basic game mechanics.

The game is still far from being ready!
